mapper.select: select teaching_work.*,sys_user.username,sys_user.realname, sys_user.avatar, sys_user.sex, (select file_path from sys_file where sys_file.id = teaching_work.work_file) workFileKey, (select file_path from sys_file where sys_file.id = teaching_work.work_cover) coverFileKey from teaching_work left join sys_user on teaching_work.user_id = sys_user.id where sys_user.del_flag=0 and teaching_work.id = #{workId}

select a.*, a.id additionalWorkId, w.id mineWorkId, w.work_name mineWorkName, w.work_status mineWorkStatus, (select file_path from sys_file where sys_file.id=w.work_file) mineWorkUrl, (select file_path from sys_file where sys_file.id = w.work_cover) mineWorkCover from teaching_additional_work a left join teaching_work w on w.additional_id = a.id and w.user_id = #{userId} where a.status=1 and
a.work_dept like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
and w.work_status >= 1
and w.id is null or w.work_status < 1
and w.work_status = #{status}
